name: Tiny Bats
description:
Enter the devious world of TINY BATS in a stunning beauty with endless gameplay. Flap and survive through elements such as portals, flamethrowers, falling and shooting spikes, barb wire, swinging fireballs, spinning blades, and much more. Easy to play, hard to master: the faster you tap, the better control you have. Fly up the deadly forest, upgrade your Tiny Bat for better agility, and see how long your can survive.

Features:
- Endless campaign with deviously imaginative gameplay
- Upgrade your Tiny Bat for better control, speed, and a different look
- Intuitive two-thumb controls combined with innovative design
- Highly immersive audiovisual gaming experience - best enjoyed with headphones
- Universal app optimized for iPhones, iPods and iPads
- Game Center support
- Super precise flying using touch
